title: What Chinese medicine remedies really are effective?
description: Answer (1 of 9): Thanks for the A2A. There are many effective Chinese medicine remedies (typically calibrated to the individual's body constitution; hence, requires a nuanced approach and is often not a one-size-fits-all solution).
